description: Song and dance moves with Hi 5 to encourage physical activity and "energy". Suitable for very young children or early primary school age. Created by Helena Harris and Posie Graeme-Evans. Can be viewed by pressing play or by selecting the profiles for each group member: Charli, Nathan, Kathleen, Tim or Kellie. Includes "Body move", "Shapes in space", "Puzzles and patterns", "Making music" and "Word play".
